title: Echocardiography Patient Education: Smartphone-Based Video Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and examination procedures
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers. Domain Expertise: Advanced. Subject/Job Field: Social Sciences. Assessment Method: Summative Assessment-Centric. Technology Environment: Digital Devices Provided

learning_goals: Learners can explain the purpose, procedure, and precautions of echocardiography with over 80% accuracy.
After watching video instruction, learners achieve scores improved by at least 20% compared to the control group in knowledge assessments.
Learners show satisfaction scores of 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale in educational satisfaction surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
